original_text: Since the time when the judges ruled Israel, the Israelites had not had a Passover festival like that. They had never had it during the time when kings ruled Judah and Israel.
korean_text: 사사가 이스라엘을 다스리던 시대부터 이스라엘 여러 왕의 시대와 유다 여러 왕의 시대에 이렇게 유월절을 지킨 일이 없었더니

sentences.original_text: Since the time when the judges ruled Israel
the Israelites had not had a Passover festival like that
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 그런 유월절을 지낸 적이 없었는데
그들은 결코 그것을 지낸 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: during the time when kings ruled Judah and Israel
